text: I have two packages: Manifolds.jl and ManifoldsBase.jl (an interface package) and I want to move a function from Manifolds.jl to ManifoldsBase.jl. This is technically a breaking change for the interface package since older versions of Manifolds.jl won't work as intended with newer versions of ManifoldsBase.jl. This new function won't break any other packages depending on ManifoldsBase.jl though. Given how frowned upon releasing breaking changes is (and especially for interface packages), what's the recommended way of handling this?
